    • Field Detail

      • ast

        AST ast
        Stores the constructed AST

      • node

    • Constructor Detail

      • ASTFactory

        public ASTFactory()
        A Factory to create an AST without needing to write a million lines of code. This is achieved by employing methods that act as "constructors" that get the child nodes directly and thus save the need to call the setters. furthermore is the last StatementNode that can have additional StatementNodes as children remembered which allows easy appending to BlockNodes

      • addBranch

        public BranchNode addBranch(ExpressionNode condition)
        creates a new BranchNode, adds it as child to the current node, and sets it as the new current node the next addBlock() will add the TrueBlock. goToParent(); addBlock() will add the FalseBlock
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition which decides which childBlock gets executed
        Returns:
        the created BranchNode

      • addLoop

        protected LoopNode addLoop(ExpressionNode condition,
               LoopNode loop)
        creates a new LoopNode, adds it as child to the current node, and sets it as the new current node (needs 2 calls to goToParent() to get to the original node)
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition to end the loop
        loop - the type of loop this is (while, dowhile)
        Returns:
        the created LoopNode
